description.english: You have cleared 3-1 through 3-S of Crazy Box.
description.german: Du hast 3-1 bis 3-S der Crazy Box abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as réussi 3-1~3-S dans Crazy Box.
description.italian: Hai completato da 3-1 a 3-S di Crazy Box.
description.spanish: Has superado de 3-1 a 3-S de Crazy Box.

description.english: You have got A class license in Arcade mode.

description.french: Tu as un permis de catégorie A dans le mode Arcade.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la patente A in modalità Arcade.
description.spanish: Has obtenido un carnet clase A en modo Arcade.
